actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 624 of title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to furnish hospital care and medical services for certain veterans in need of such care while sojourning or residing abroad.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to furnish necessary hospital care and medical services for veterans in need of such care while sojourning or residing abroad.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 624 of title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to furnish hospital care and medical services for certain veterans in need of such care while sojourning or residing abroad.
